title: Sip Or Spill: If Bert Doesn't Answer These Questions He Has To Drink Kristin's Homemade Goat Cheese!
description:
Last week during Sip or Spill Moe drank a breakfast special that Keity put together herself. 1 Raw egg, ranch, syrup, ketchup, and a double shot of expresso to get him through the morning.
This week is Bert's turn again and Kristin made his favorite! GOAT CHEESE!
